14
15#ifndef DNS_SOA_H
16#define DNS_SOA_H 1
17
18/*****
19 ***** Module Info
20 *****/
21
22/*! \file dns/soa.h
23 * \brief
24 * SOA utilities.
25 */
26
27/***
28 *** Imports
29 ***/
30
31#include <inttypes.h>
32
33#include <isc/lang.h>
34#include <isc/types.h>
35
36#include <dns/types.h>
37
38ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
39
40#define DNS_SOA_BUFFERSIZE ((2 * DNS_NAME_MAXWIRE) + (4 * 5))
41
42isc_result_t
43dns_soa_buildrdata(const dns_name_t *origin, const dns_name_t *contact,
44 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
45 uint32_t serial, uint32_t refresh,
46 uint32_t retry, uint32_t expire,
47 uint32_t minimum, unsigned char *buffer,
48 dns_rdata_t *rdata);
49/*%<
50 * Build the rdata of an SOA record.
51 *
52 * Requires:
53 *\li buffer Points to a temporary buffer of at least
54 * DNS_SOA_BUFFERSIZE bytes.
55 *\li rdata Points to an initialized dns_rdata_t.
56 *
57 * Ensures:
58 * \li *rdata Contains a valid SOA rdata. The 'data' member
59 * refers to 'buffer'.
60 */
61
62uint32_t
63dns_soa_getserial(dns_rdata_t *rdata);
64uint32_t
65dns_soa_getrefresh(dns_rdata_t *rdata);
66uint32_t
67dns_soa_getretry(dns_rdata_t *rdata);
68uint32_t
69dns_soa_getexpire(dns_rdata_t *rdata);
70uint32_t
71dns_soa_getminimum(dns_rdata_t *rdata);
72/*
73 * Extract an integer field from the rdata of a SOA record.
74 *
75 * Requires:
76 * rdata refers to the rdata of a well-formed SOA record.
77 */
78
79void
80dns_soa_setserial(uint32_t val, dns_rdata_t *rdata);
81void
82dns_soa_setrefresh(uint32_t val, dns_rdata_t *rdata);
83void
84dns_soa_setretry(uint32_t val, dns_rdata_t *rdata);
85void
86dns_soa_setexpire(uint32_t val, dns_rdata_t *rdata);
87void
88dns_soa_setminimum(uint32_t val, dns_rdata_t *rdata);
89/*
90 * Change an integer field of a SOA record by modifying the
91 * rdata in-place.
92 *
93 * Requires:
94 * rdata refers to the rdata of a well-formed SOA record.
95 */
96
97
98ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
99
100#endif /* DNS_SOA_H */
101
